members.name: variant
members.description:
The variant of the busy indicator.
- `spinner` (default): displays a spinner.
- `progress`: displays a progress bar.
- `message-only`: No progress indicator is displayed.

members.description: Indicates whether the busy indicator surface should be transparent (no background or elevation).

slots.description: Default slot for dialog content (typically ai-chat-interface)

members.name: open
members.description: Indicates whether the dialog is open.

members.name: expanded
members.description:
Controls the dialog's positioning and size behavior.
When true, the dialog will have an expanded width and be centered on the screen.
When false, the dialog will be positioned at the bottom-right corner with a fixed width.

members.description: Gets the current fullscreen state (readonly)

members.name: show
members.description: Opens the dialog.

members.name: close
members.description: Closes the dialog.

members.description: Toggles the dialog open state.

attributes.name: expanded

Controls the dialog's positioning and size behavior.
When true, the dialog will have an expanded width and be centered on the screen.
When false, the dialog will be positioned at the bottom-right corner with a fixed width.

members.description: Indicates whether the sidebar chat is open.

Controls whether the chat is displayed in an expanded modal state.
When true, the chat content will be shown in a fullscreen modal.
When false, the chat will be displayed in the sidebar.
